DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.
Arcs to a random enemy on hit, dealing #bone #bthird damage per bounce.
Target loses Max HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Applies #yChill equal to damage dealt. Creatures deal #b1% less damage per #yChill stack they have.
Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage.
Creatures deal #b5% less damage per stack of Chill they have, to a maximum of #b50%. At end of the round, Chill is halved.
Your next card is #b50% more effective.
An effect triggered if you play a card of the required type.
Frozen creatures are unable to act, but are also invincible.
Increase the effect of ALL instances of this card this combat.
A #yRetaining card that has no effect when played, but has effects while in your hand. Has a limited number of #yUses and automatically #yExhausts when out.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile when it is played.
Targets take up to double damage based on the ratio between Shadow Split and their current HP. Excess Shadow Split causes the target to lose HP.
Whenever you would lose HP, lose #b2 less. At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yCharge if you did not lose HP last turn.
Damage taken is halved. Exit this #yStance at the start of your next turn.
Star Cards are cost #b0 cards which #yPurge when played. Adding them to your hand consumes #yStar #yPower.
Star Power carries over between combats and is used to add #yStar #yCards to your hand. At the start of each turn, #b10% progress to your next Star Power is gained.
